welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Crown Point, the charming city known for its scenic beauty and historic landmarks! We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the wonderful things this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porter County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Porter County Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
